TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeflateStream extends System.IO.Stream

summary.span: Provides methods and properties for compressing and decompressing streams by using the Deflate algorithm.

span.span: Provides methods and properties for compressing and decompressing streams by using the Deflate algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示 Deflate 算法，这是用于无损文件压缩和解压缩的行业标准算法。This class represents the Deflate algorithm, which is an industry-standard algorithm for lossless file compression and decompression. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、类使用 zlib 库。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class uses the zlib library. 因此，它提供更好的压缩算法，并且在大多数情况下，比它更小压缩的文件提供.NET Framework 的早期版本。As a result, it provides a better compression algorithm and, in most cases, a smaller compressed file than it provides in earlier versions of the .NET Framework. 此类不本质上是提供用于添加文件或 zip 存档中的解压缩文件的功能。This class does not inherently provide functionality for adding files to or extracting files from zip archives. 若要使用 zip 存档，请使用和类。To work with zip archives, use the and the classes. 类使用相同的压缩算法作为使用 gzip 数据格式类。The class uses the same compression algorithm as the gzip data format used by the class. 中的压缩功能和以流的形式公开。The compression functionality in and is exposed as a stream. 基于逐字节地读取数据，因此不可能进行多轮验证来确定压缩整个文件或较大的数据块的最佳方法。Data is read on a byte-by-byte basis, so it is not possible to perform multiple passes to determine the best method for compressing entire files or large blocks of data. 和未压缩的数据源，最好使用类。The and classes are best used on uncompressed sources of data. 如果已压缩源数据，使用这些类实际上可能增加流的大小。If the source data is already compressed, using these classes may actually increase the size of the stream. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类来压缩和解压缩文件的目录。The following example shows how to use the class to compress and decompress a directory of files. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/CS/deflatetest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/VB/deflatetest.vb#1)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类压缩大于 4 GB 将导致异常的文件。Using the class to compress a file larger than 4 GB will cause an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你想要指定压缩效率或速度是否更重要的实例时使用此构造函数类。You use this constructor when you want to specify whether compression efficiency or speed is more important for an instance of the class. 此构造函数重载使用的压缩模式。This constructor overload uses the compression mode . 若要压缩模式设置为另一个值，使用或重载。To set the compression mode to another value, use the or overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在创建时设置压缩级别对象。The following example shows how to set the compression level when creating a object. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/vb/program1.vb#1)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified stream and compression mode.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified stream and compression mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，拥有基础流，以便关闭流也会关闭基础流。By default, owns the underlying stream, so closing the stream also closes the underlying stream. 请注意，基础流的状态可能会影响该流的可用性。Note that the state of the underlying stream can affect the usability of the stream. 此外，任何显式检查会不进行，因此没有其他引发异常时创建的新实例。Also, no explicit checks are performed, so no additional exceptions are thrown when the new instance is created. 实例时，如果类创建与`mode`参数等于`Compress`，则会立即插入标头信息。If an instance of the class is created with the `mode` parameter equal to `Compress`, header information is inserted immediately. 如果任何进一步的操作不发生，流将显示为有效、 空的压缩文件。If no further action occurs, the stream appears as a valid, empty, compressed file. 使用类压缩大于 4 GB 引发异常的文件。Using the class to compress a file larger than 4 GB raises an exception. 默认情况下，压缩级别设置为压缩模式时。By default, the compression level is set to when the compression mode is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类来压缩和解压缩文件。The following example shows how to use the class to compress and decompress a file. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/CS/deflatetest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/VB/deflatetest.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你想要指定压缩效率或速度是否更重要的实例时使用此构造函数类，以及是否释放之后打开流对象对象。You use this constructor when you want to specify whether compression efficiency or speed is more important for an instance of the class, and whether to leave the stream object open after disposing the object. 此构造函数重载使用的压缩模式。This constructor overload uses the compression mode . 若要压缩模式设置为另一个值，使用或重载。To set the compression mode to another value, use the or overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在创建时设置压缩级别对象以及如何打开流。The following example shows how to set the compression level when creating a object and how to leave the stream open. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/vb/program2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以使用执行异步读取的操作方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous read operations by using the method. 方法是在中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支持旧版代码; 但是，你可以通过来实现异步 I/O 操作更轻松地使用新的异步方法。The method is still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . 传递返回到值以确定已读取的字节数并释放用于进行读取的操作系统资源的流的方法。Pass the return value to the method of the stream to determine how many bytes were read and to release operating system resources used for reading. 你可完成此操作通过使用相同的代码调用或传递给回调。You can do this either by using the same code that called or in a callback passed to . 流中的当前位置被更新时执行的异步读取或写入操作时，会发出，未完成 I/O 操作。The current position in the stream is updated when the asynchronous read or write operation is issued, not when the I/O operation completes. 多个同时进行的异步请求呈现请求完成顺序不确定。Multiple simultaneous asynchronous requests render the request completion order uncertain. 使用属性来确定是否当前对象支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current object supports reading. 如果流已关闭或传递了无效参数，将立即引发异常从。If a stream is closed or you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately from . 异步读取请求，例如，I/O 请求过程的磁盘故障过程中发生的错误发生在线程池线程和调用时引发异常。Errors that occur during an asynchronous read request, such as a disk failure during the I/O request, occur on the thread pool thread and throw exceptions when calling .

exception.span: The method tried to read asynchronously past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurred.

span.span: The method tried to read asynchronously past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurred.

exception.span: One or more of the arguments is invalid.

span.span: One or more of the arguments is invalid.

exception.span: Methods were called after the stream was closed.

span.span: Methods were called after the stream was closed.

exception.span: The current implementation does not support the read operation.

span.span: The current implementation does not support the read operation.

exception.span: This call cannot be completed.

span.span: This call cannot be completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以通过执行异步写操作方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous write operations by using the method. 方法是在中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支持旧版代码; 但是，你可以通过来实现异步 I/O 操作更轻松地使用新的异步方法。The method is still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . 传递到当前方法返回的对象以确保写入完成，并相应地释放资源。Pass the object returned by the current method to to ensure that the write completes and frees resources appropriately. 你可完成此操作通过使用相同的代码调用或传递给回调。You can do this either by using the same code that called or in a callback passed to . 如果在异步写操作期间发生错误，将不会引发异常之前使用调用此方法返回。If an error occurs during an asynchronous write operation, an exception will not be thrown until is called with the returned by this method. 如果流是可写，在流末尾写入将扩展流。If a stream is writable, writing at the end of the stream expands the stream. 当发出异步读取或写入操作，不是在 I/O 操作完成时，流中的当前位置被更新。The current position in the stream is updated when you issue the asynchronous read or write operation, not when the I/O operation completes. 多个同时进行的异步请求呈现请求完成顺序不确定。Multiple simultaneous asynchronous requests render the request completion order uncertain. 使用属性来确定是否当前对象支持写入。Use the property to determine whether the current object supports writing. 如果流已关闭或传递了无效参数，将立即引发异常从。If a stream is closed or you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately from . 异步写入请求，例如，I/O 请求过程的磁盘故障过程中发生的错误发生在线程池线程和调用时引发异常。Errors that occur during an asynchronous write request, such as a disk failure during the I/O request, occur on the thread pool thread and throw exceptions when calling .

exception.span: The method tried to write asynchronously past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurred.

span.span: The method tried to write asynchronously past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurred.

exception.span: The write operation cannot be performed because the stream is closed.

span.span: The write operation cannot be performed because the stream is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 调用受保护方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以使用执行异步读取的操作方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous read operations by using the method. 方法是在中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支持旧版代码; 但是，你可以通过来实现异步 I/O 操作更轻松地使用新的异步方法。The method is still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . 调用此方法以确定已从流中读取的字节数。Call this method to determine how many bytes were read from the stream. 可以一次调用此方法以返回到调用之间读取的字节数和。This method can be called once to return the amount of bytes read between calls to and . 此方法将一直阻塞，直到 I/O 操作已完成。This method blocks until the I/O operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以通过执行异步写操作方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous write operations by using the method. 方法是在中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支持旧版代码; 但是，你可以通过来实现异步 I/O 操作更轻松地使用新的异步方法。The method is still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . 必须为对每个调用一次调用方法。 must be called only once for every call to the method. 此方法将一直阻塞，直到 I/O 操作已完成。This method blocks until the I/O operation has completed. 异步写入请求，例如，I/O 请求过程的磁盘故障过程中发生的错误发生在线程池线程和调用时变得可见。Errors that occur during an asynchronous write request, such as a disk failure during the I/O request, occur on the thread pool thread and become visible upon a call to . 由线程池线程引发的异常时调用将无法看到。Exceptions thrown by the thread pool thread will not be visible when calling .
